accordion.description: Collapsable content panels for displaying information in a limited amount of space.

autocomplete.description: Provides a list of suggested words as the user is typing.

button.description: Enhance your forms with themable buttons.

draggable.description: Enable dragging functionality for any element.

droppable.description: Create drop targets for draggable elements.

mouse.description: An abstraction for any mouse-based interactions.

progressbar.description: A status indicator that can be used for a loading state and standard percentage indicators.

resizable.description: Enable resize functioality for any element.

selectable.description: Create groups of elements that can be selected with the mouse.

slider.description: A flexible slider with ranges and accessibility via keyboard.

sortable.description: Sort items in a list using the mouse.

spinner.description: Easily input numbers via the keyboard or mouse.

tabs.description: Transforms a set of container elements into a tab structure.

tooltip.description: Show additional information for any element on hover or focus.
